name: Consumer Debt Defense
description: Debt can happen to anyone, but it doesn’t have to take over your life. Whether it’s from credit cards, emergency loans, scams, or the rising cost of living, falling into debt is easy, but getting out can feel overwhelming. You don’t have to face aggressive creditors, threatening letters, or relentless phone calls alone. There’s no shame in seeking help—especially after a lifetime of hard work.
